Class TaskDependencyGraph<T>

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.server.scheduling.TaskDependencyGraph<T>
public class TaskDependencyGraph<T> extends Object
Task Dependency DAG (Directed Acyclic Graph) for workflow scheduling. Features: - Define task dependencies - Topological ordering - Parallel execution of independent tasks - Completion tracking
